EmailTemplate.subject: webinar test
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
An archive of the BD Corporate Webinar covering CRM best practices and Reporting is now available! Tune in to get up to speed on activity entry and report generation including how to log meetings into the Calendar and extract these interactions in a meaningful way through Track Actions and the Reports tab
Dear Client,
